desc: 雷属性ユニットからの被ダメージを５％軽減

dictionary.lore: A magical piece of equipment created by an inventor in the Atharva Republic. Though people struck by lightning would usually die, wearing this piece of equipment lowers that probability considerably. Though originally created to control lightning, it would be praised for its ability to resist thunder attacks, and was subsequently used in fights against lightning wielding monsters.

name: 雷装レジ・ストラ
